text:
Dears,
after chatting with <@U04M5SGCM5J>, we have finally decided to have an (open) chat on “Big Lightsheet:  what are best commercial light-sheet microscopes for cleared samples”?
Friday 23rd of June – 3:00 – 4:00 pm (UK Time – GMT+1)
Surely we`ll not find the answer.. but hopefully we`ll have at least ideas a bit more clear. We`ll start comparing the 3i CTLS and Blaze Miltenyi, but hopefully also other products’;

Anyone else want to join? It`s open, but please, to make a fluent & honest discussion:1) if you are from a company, you`ll need it to declare it 2) please keep camera ON (to know a bit better with whom we are speaking with /make it more human);
Zoom link below

Also, in case it can help for the discussion, I attach a list of parameters I find useful to check; the Q is: what are the more important features for a light-sheet purchase?..

Time: Jun 23, 2023 03:00 PM London
Join Zoom Meeting
<https://crick.zoom.us/j/63771166279?pwd=SkVOVU5GL0cybHRtcDZURVhXdFRUQT09>
Meeting ID: 637 7116 6279
Passcode: 329446

text: Great, thank you again Alessandro, it is in my diary :slightly_smiling_face:
